form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: Los Angeles Unified School District, Screeneded by NARA, 7/31/2023

full_text: Screened by NARA, 7/31/2023 Los ANGELES UNIFIED SCHOOL DISTRICT LEONARD M. BRITTON Superintendent of Schools Virgil Junior High School ALLAN I. WEXLER Principal NORTH VERMONT AVENUE, Los ANGELES, CALIFORNIA 90004 TELEPHONE: (213)388-0347 March 7, 1989 TO WHOM IT MAY CONCERN: This is to certify that Mrs. Rehka M. Desai, employee# 287598, has been employed with the Los Angeles Unified School District since May, 1977. Mrs. Desai has been working full time as a classroom teacher at Virgil Junior High School since December, 1978. Virgil Junior High School is a year-round school and as a result Mrs. Desai receives a four week gross pay of $3131.00, twelve months per year in addition to a $4,000.00 yearly stipend for mentoring. The probability of continued employment is excellent. If additional information is required regarding Mrs. Desai's employment, please feel free to contact me at (213) 388-0347. Sincerely, Allan I. Wexler Principal AIW:jj
